description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
tags: DMG acknowledges needed material has been withhold to best interest of Government
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Notice Title

* Title: "Hardware and Brackets"
* Title (French): "Quincaillerie et supports"

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** `cb-5306-63093642`
* **Modification Number:** `12`
* **Solicitation Number:** `W8486-238852/B`
* **Publication Date:** `2023-07-19`
* **Tender Closing Date:** `2023-10-13T14:00:00` (Note: This tender has already closed.)
* **Amendment Date:** `2023-10-13`
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** `2023-10-31`
* **Expected Contract End Date:** `2024-01-05`

#### Tender Details

* **Description (English):** The Department of National Defence requires hardware and brackets for various equipment. Delivery is requested at 7 CF Supply Depot, Edmonton, Alberta by November 30, 2023.
* **Description (French):** Le ministère de la Défense nationale souhaite acquérir de la quincaillerie et des supports pour divers équipements. La livraison est demandée au 7 DAFC, Edmonton, Alberta avant le 30 novembre 2023.

#### Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN)

* **GSIN:** None
* **Description (English):** None
* **Description (French):** None

#### United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPC)

* **UNSPC:** *31160000, *31270000, *31400000
* **Description (English):** *Hardware, Machine made parts, Gaskets
* **Description (French):** *Matériel, Pièces fabriquées à la machine, Joints d'étanchéité

#### Selection Criteria

* **Selection Criteria (English):** Lowest Price
* **Selection Criteria (French):** Prix le plus bas

#### Trade Agreements

* **Trade Agreements (English):** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and so on.
* **Trade Agreements (French):** Accord de libre-échange Canada-Corée, Accord de Partenariat transpacifique global et progressiste (PTPGP), etc.

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Leslie Hawkins
* **Contact Email:** lesl
